Tom Lau
tomoslau@gmail.com

Hi, I’m Tom.

🦵 I like to squat.

🎸 I also enjoy playing guitar, drawing my dogs (usually when they’re not looking) and making custom sneakers.

✏️ As a kid I loved drawing and making videos, so I decided to go to an art school. After graduating, I somehow landed a job at a digital studio, where I taught myself HTML and CSS.

🤓 Since then, I’ve been working on campaigns, websites and products with brands and businesses, as well as side projects like Jook.

💭 I design products to be more useful, accessible, and pleasing. I enjoy working through the entire design process: from product thinking, user interviews and research to creating flows, prototypes, testing with users and validating problem/solution fit.

Get in touch: tomoslau@gmail.com
